alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 1:32PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Passaic, Bergen and northwestern Essex Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairfield, or near Caldwell, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Occasional cloud to ground lightning may also occur. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Passaic, Wayne, Hackensack, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ridgewood, Caldwell, Englewood, Hawthorne, Oradell, Fairfield, Norwood, Teterboro and Clifton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex
